articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.description: NASA'S Perseverance Rover has been spotted on the surface of Mars by its European counterpart following the US's rover's successful landing on the Red Planet.
articles.title: NASA Mars Rover: Perseverance spotted in Jezero Crater by ESA's ExoMars orbiter - Daily Express
